title: Psalms 110:1
text: THE LORD said unto my Lord, Sit thou at my right hand, until I make thine enemies thy footstool.

title: Psalms 110:2
text: The LORD shall send the rod of thy strength out of Zion: rule thou in the midst of thine enemies.

title: Psalms 110:3
text: Thy people shall be willing in the day of thy power, in the beauties of holiness from the womb of the morning: thou hast the dew of thy youth.

title: Psalms 110:4
text: The LORD hath sworn, and will not repent, Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchizedek.

title: Psalms 110:5
text: The Lord at thy right hand shall strike through kings in the day of his wrath.

title: Psalms 110:6
text: He shall judge among the heathen, he shall fill the places with the dead bodies; he shall wound the heads over many countries.

title: Psalms 110:7
text: He shall drink of the brook in the way: therefore shall he lift up the head.
